nodes.text: The Tanallay Surge posting agency was a posting agency for bounty hunters located at the Tanallay Surge complex on the Expansion Region world of Tynna. A dingy and dark place, the agency featured an information desk and several posters.

At some point by 0 BBY, the posting agency was visited by two bounty hunters; one checked the posters on the wall while another engaged in conversation with a being behind the desk. An R5-series astromech droid was also present at the agency at the same time. The visit of the two bounty hunters was depicted in an illustration of the posting agency published in the Updated Imperial Edition of the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook.
The Tanallay Surge posting agency was first mentioned in the 2013 reference book The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett, written by Daniel Wallace, Ryder Windham, and Jason Fry.
